meanings.definition: A code consisting of letters and/or numbers assigned to a specific address for mail delivery.
meanings.sent1: I always include the postcodes when sending letters to my friends.
meanings.sent2: The postcodes help the postal workers deliver mail to the correct houses.
meanings.sent3: My cat thinks the postcodes are secret messages just for her.
meanings.sent4: The postcodes act like tiny guides leading the mail to its destination.
meanings.sent5: Remembering the postcodes is like solving a fun puzzle every time I mail something.

meanings.definition: To assign a postcode to a specific location for mail sorting and delivery.
meanings.sent1: I need to postcode all the packages before they can be sent out.
meanings.sent2: The post office will postcode the new neighborhood soon.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if I can postcode my way to faster mail delivery.
meanings.sent4: She postcodes with such precision that no mail ever gets lost.
meanings.sent5: Postcoding the letters feels like giving them a special ticket to their destination.
